name: TAKANARIA
description: TAKANARIA is a very simple game created with Pixel art.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
